A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know why there is a backlash to this movie. Rian Johnson did a spectacular job with this film\, I fell that he develop the character's very well to a point where I got to know them better. I love the story as well\, it was a surprise in a good way because it now leaves even bigger questions out there for us to seek an answer. The film also presented the conflict of good vs. evil in a way that I have never thought of before. Great film!
